import React, {useContext, useEffect, useState} from "react"; import AuthContext from "../../context/autenticacion/authContext"; //Import Breadcrumb import Breadcrumbs from "../../components/Common/Breadcrumb"; import { Row, Col, Card, CardBody, FormGroup, Button, Label, Input, Container, CustomInput, } from "reactstrap"; import {AvForm, AvField, AvInput} from "availity-reactstrap-validation"; import {countries} from "../../helpers/utils"; const Profile = () => { const authContext = useContext(AuthContext); const {usuarioAutenticado, usuario} = authContext; console.log(usuario); useEffect(() => { usuarioAutenticado(); }, []); /*Creacion del objeto usuario */ const [user, guardarUsuario] = useState({ name: "", surname: "", email: "", password: "", birthday: "", country: "", image: "", }); const actualizarState = (e) => { guardarUsuario({ ...user, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); registrarUsuario({ name, surname, email, password, birthday, country, image, }); }; return (

Datos personales
); }; export default Profile;
